name: Speed Rapture
description:
Speed Rapture is an Unreal Engine 4 based racing game with the goal to relax the player and try to create a rapture-like driving experience with hilly terrain, chill music and a good atmosphere.

Made for Dynamic Programming module submission in 3rd year of study at UEL. 

Try to beat my personal highest lap speed: 51,86 !

Have fun!
